If you want to learn more & educate others on the fur trade please see this post from @peta 
https://t.co/GvYLvw5Hqx 
#fur
@ColinsCity programme mentioned rabbit, racoon dog, weasel and 2 others.
@ColinsCity well they r at fault for not doing the proper checks... they r accountable for what they buy and sell. Their policy has failed.
@ColinsCity Associates have asked us to highlight which shops are selling it. Avoid the fur, not TK Maxx.

There's no need to buy fur faux or otherwise - check our list of fabrics that are suitable for vegans...
 https://t.co/iTGfuDMyz8

If YOU spot what u think is real fur, being sold as faux fur plz tell the shop, trading standards & the VLA...
https://t.co/ZHNX2a7SWa
Is it time for us to question wearing faux fur at all? As its perpetuating a 'look' & indeed the real fur trade. Faux fur sales have doubled
You can identify real #fur by the thinning of the ends of the strands & its backed onto skin rather than fabric #FakeBritain
On the high street 5 different types of animal fur were found on allegedly 'faux fur' products by #FakeBritain :(
TK Maxx also selling 'faux fur' that has been proven to be real fur. Please please please avoid. #fur #FakeBritain
Even a coat bought from House of Fraser saying 'faux fur' was not... #FakeBritain if in ANY doubt - we advise you to avoid buying.
Because of the horrific mass farming of animals for fur, price has gone down, hence being used by fakers... #FakeBritain

#fur #veganfashion 
Law states if real fur used a garment label must say 'of animal origin'...
Cheap clothing in UK found to be real fur.

BBC1 *NOW* Fake Britain...
 
Expose on #fauxfur that is actually REAL #fur! :(
 
Please watch if poss & raise awareness.
#FakeBritain
